column4: Hello, channel.  In Ubuntu, is there anywhere else but /etc/init.d/ where the command line used to invoke a daemon might be stored?  I installed bitlbee a while back and changed the port it listens on, but I can't for the life of me find where I did it...
if it is upstart enabled you will find it in /etc/init
use dpkg -L bitlbee to find the files it installed
